summary: When a woman he meets is murdered, a soon-to-ship-out sailor has until dawn to find the killer, aided by a weary dance hall girl.

keywords: naivety|no abnormal brother sister relationship|tension|strained husband wife relationship|stress

title: Muerte al amanecer
